name: My Mailbox Calendar
description: Manage a web calendar through email invitations.

IMAP_HOST.description: the IMAP server to connect to. Examples: "imap.gmail.com", "imap.gmail.com:993"

IMAP_USER.description: the username on the server for login. Example: "my.mailbox.calendar@gmail.com"

IMAP_SSL.description: Whether to connect to the IMAP server using SSL encryption. Encryption is used by default.

IMAP_CHECK.description: Check whether the app can connect to the IMAP server with the given credentials.

OPEN_WEB_CALENDAR_URL.description: The url of the open web calendar server to display an html page containing the calendar.
